list.name: Update Ivy Deps; Migrate Hadoop to 0.20.203.0 Release & Pig to 0.8.3
list.comment: Updating Ivy Dependencies to use now available public hadoop artifacts - Migrating Hadoop to 0.20.203 http://hadoop.apache.org/common/docs/r0.20.203.0/releasenotes.html - Migrating Pig to 0.8.3

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: As an "expedient" some changes were made to the classic mapReduce interface which break things severely. For now, no sharding support in Classic M/R. Reverted.

MESSAGE.value: Conform to 10gen Java Standards by having all variables in ONE PLACE (to start with) and AT THE END OF THE FILE.

Destroy hardcoding of getLength which breaks in almost every case (E.G. custom chunk size) Removed inexplicable implementations of both old and new MapReduce interfaces which is causing major Hadoop bugs; we support ONLY the new interface as always.
As an "expedient" some changes were made to the classic mapReduce interface which break things severely. For now, no sharding support in Classic M/R. Reverted.
